title: ur ranked sistem is fucked up
body:
every game i get 2 or more players in my team who troll or feed or are bad as fuck and deserve bronze
this is a bug from ur ranked system
ur game is unplayable on my account .every game is just toxic ,disgusting i can;t even enjoy the game because of so many losses
are u hating me or what what have i done to u rito ?
i lose 20 games just from g1 60 lp to g2 0 lp
is this legal or funny for u? to do this to me?
i don;t know very much about ur system
but i',m sure i deserve more respect because every game seems to be lost minutes from my life
i'm watching streamers how they climb in divisions and i;m curious if they can do climbing 1vs5 every game or 2 vs5 on my account
i can give u my acc to test it and to enjoy a lose before 20 or 30 mins
and if i need to pay u something i will pay u if there's no other solution for this fuckin bull shit

replies.body: I can't understand what you're saying. Is that even English?

> ur ranked sistem is fucked up

More than your grammar?

http://www.reactiongifs.com/r/2012/11/OohBurn.gif


{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

,if i lost a letter is more than my grammar wtf u stupids fuck u 
gtfo from my post  here isn;t school and i;m better  than you if it would be
u w0t m8? :-D
sry for flame but all of u said " is that english ?"
man u know it comes from your
Lol, he means 'System'.

>sistem

dat SIStem lolz
ok is system but  why should i care?
YOUR SPELLING IS FUCKED UP!
ENGLISH DO YOU SPEAK IT!?

hey this is a game  , do you know that ?
if all of you come to my post to say the same thing then go fuckin away
you should give me some tips to help me to improve not to say about my english!
if you're losing its your own fault.
tell me a champ that does 1vs5

anything with waveclear. and you can build enough waveclear.

This is an objective game, Killing the enemy is only to keep them from taking your objectives, or to prevent them from hitting yours.

In a serious game nobody should be able to 1v5. It never happens in LCS.

If someone can 1v5 that means he/she is way better than the rest. Like Challenger dude playing against bronzies and such
Nasus, Jayce, Yasuo, Yi, Illaoi, Renekton, Cho'Gath, Irelia, Kayle, Jax, Riven, youre welcome
now i started to win i have  5 wins 1 lose
I can't tell if this is satire.

> sistem

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Play Dota 2, there toxic trolls have their own que.
